name: YAWS - Yet Another Waveshooter
description:
YAWS (Yet Another Waveshooter) is a waveshooter in three epochs (fantasy, present, and future). Defend yourself against never ending waves of enemies with increasing difficulty until you die. After death, you will be transported to the next level. Engage in an immersive experience with anit-motionsickness movement to gain the top score.

This game can't be won - beat the highscore and survive as long as possible!




Please tell me if there is anything to change.
dennis.heine@gmx.de
